lead_paragraph: Matt Carothers is the host of ":58 Flat" and "Blinkers Off" on TVG, as well being one its regular analysts. He started playing the horses long before the law allows.
snippet: It's now officially Breeders' Cup week, and as we get close to post position draws, the connections of the cross-entered (horses entered in more than one Breeders' Cup race) are making up their minds. These decisions can be revealing.
abstract: It's now officially Breeders' Cup week, and as we get close to post position draws, the connections of the cross-entered (horses entered in more than one Breeders' Cup race) are making up their minds. These decisions can be revealing.
